snippet: The plan to bypass the event is the latest sign of the deteriorating relationship with the United States over Ukraine.
abstract: Russia announces plans to boycott an international nuclear security summit meeting to be hosted by Pres Obama, latest sign of the deteriorating relationship between the two nuclear powers, particularly over clash in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The plan to bypass the event is the latest sign of the deteriorating relationship with the United States over Ukraine.

headline.main: Russia Plans to Boycott 2016 Nuclear Meeting Hosted by Obama
headline.print_headline: Russia Plans to Boycott 2016 Nuclear Meeting Hosted by Obama
